main.name: Dayne Beronque
main.bio: Originally from Houston, Texas, I moved to Austin to pursue an undergraduate degree at the University of Texas. After receiving my Bachelor's degree in Biology, I completed the university's coding bootcamp--this move fueled by my growing passion for the tech industry, as well as my own personal agenda in developing my skills as a frontend web developer.
main.contactmessage: Let's grab a coffee and chat!
main.contactdescript: I'm always interested in talking with prospective employers, freelance clients, fellow engineers, & anyone else interesting. Let's grab a coffee and chat!

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
